dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Found in sandy areas (Ref. 40898).  Territorial males defend a small patch of sand against conspecific males only (Ref. 40898).  Foraging females and non-territorial males form large schools (Ref. 40898).

dataObjects.description: Endemic to Lake Malawi where it is restricted to Mdokas in the northern part of the lake.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
